about_the_game:
Unleash your inner hacker skills and code your way to victory in a game where complex algorithms and intuitive gameplay collide.

Net.Attack() is a dynamic Top-Down Action Roguelite where you create your own abilities using programming. Dive into the node-based coding system, designed for both newcomers and coding enthusiasts. Build, tweak, and optimize your attacks and dominate the virtual battleboards.

In this demo you get the chance to face the hordes of enemies in the first area after a short tutorial. With the first 2 characters and over 100 different notes, the demo offers a wide range of different possibilities on 5 unlockable difficulties.

Game Features:

Revolutionizes coding by providing a drag-and-drop node system that turns complex coding concepts into visual, manageable components. This user-friendly interface allows you to easily construct and refine powerful algorithms, making the art of coding both fun and accessible to everyone, regardless of prior programming knowledge. This demo offers over 100 different nodes with which you can combine an endless number of different attacks.

Experience fast-paced top-down action that will push you to your strategic limits in each of the 5 rounds available in the demo.

No two playthroughs are the same in Net.Attack(). The demo is constantly evolving with new challenges that test your problem-solving skills and creativity. The 5 unlockable difficulty levels require you to adapt and optimize your code and attacks.

Net.Attack() is a dynamic Top-Down Action Roguelite where you create your own abilities using programming. Dive into the node-based coding system, designed for both newcomers and coding enthusiasts. Build, tweak, and optimize your attacks and dominate the virtual battleboards.

In this demo you get the chance to face the hordes of enemies in the first area after a short tutorial. With the first 2 characters and over 100 different notes, the demo offers a wide range of different possibilities on 5 unlockable difficulties.

Game Features:

Revolutionizes coding by providing a drag-and-drop node system that turns complex coding concepts into visual, manageable components. This user-friendly interface allows you to easily construct and refine powerful algorithms, making the art of coding both fun and accessible to everyone, regardless of prior programming knowledge. This demo offers over 100 different nodes with which you can combine an endless number of different attacks.

Experience fast-paced top-down action that will push you to your strategic limits in each of the 5 rounds available in the demo.

No two playthroughs are the same in Net.Attack(). The demo is constantly evolving with new challenges that test your problem-solving skills and creativity. The 5 unlockable difficulty levels require you to adapt and optimize your code and attacks.

name: Net.Attack() Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® 8
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 4570 (or quad-core equivalent)
  • Memory: 5 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 11700F (or eight-core equivalent)5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Unleash your inner hacker skills and code your way to victory in a demo where complex algorithms and intuitive gameplay collide.Net.Attack() is a dynamic Top-Down Survivors-like Roguelite where you create your own abilities using programming.
